meta.title_zh: 比較價格：哪個比較划算？

dialogue.text: Hello! Do you have any questions?
dialogue.zh:
你好! 你 有 任何 questions?
こんにちは! Do あなた have any questions?

dialogue.text: Yes, I’m comparing these two yogurts.
dialogue.zh:
是的, 我’m comparing these two yogurts.
はい, 私’m comparing these two yogurts.

dialogue.text: Sure. What are you looking for?
dialogue.zh:
當然. What 是 你 在找 ?
もちろん. What are あなた 探して for?

dialogue.text: Which one is cheaper per cup?
dialogue.zh:
Which one 是 更便宜 per cup?
Which one 私 cheaper per cup?

dialogue.text: Let’s check the unit price label.
dialogue.zh:
Let’s check the unit 價格 label.
Let’s check the unit 値段 label.

好的.
わかりました.

This one 是 $60 4 cups.
This one 私 $60 for 4 cups.

And the other one?
And the other one?

The other 是 $85 6 cups.
The other 私 $85 for 6 cups.

dialogue.text: So the second is cheaper, right?
dialogue.zh:
So the second 是 更便宜, right?
So the second 私 cheaper, right?

是的, it’s 更便宜 per cup.
はい, it’s cheaper per cup.

太好了.
いいですね.

dialogue.text: Do you want plain or flavored?
dialogue.zh:
你 想要 plain or flavored?
Do あなた want plain or flavored?

Plain.
Plain.

This brand has less 糖.
This brand has less 砂糖.

That’s good.
That’s good.

任何 dietary preference, like low-fat?
Any dietary preference, like low-fat?

Low-fat, 請.
Low-fat, お願いします.

dialogue.text: Then this one is a better fit.
dialogue.zh:
Then this one 是 a better fit.
Then this one 私 a better fit.

我’ll take it.
私’ll take it.

dialogue.text: Do you need a bigger size?
dialogue.zh:
你 需要 a bigger size?
Do あなた 必要 a bigger size?

不, this 是 enough.
いいえ, this 私 enough.

dialogue.text: Would you like to add fruit with it?
dialogue.zh:
Would 你 like to add fruit with it?
Would あなた like to add fruit with it?

Maybe bananas.
Maybe bananas.

Bananas 是 on 特價 today.
Bananas are on セール today.

Nice, 我’ll get some.
Nice, 私’ll get some.

dialogue.text: Anything else I can help with?
dialogue.zh:
Anything else 我 可以 幫忙 with?
Anything else 私 できます 手伝う with?

不, 謝謝.
いいえ, ありがとう.

Happy shopping!
Happy shopping!

謝謝!
ありがとう!
